parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the life state of the given unit.
{<template><title>!</title></template>
! <template><title>arma2</title></template>
! <template><title>arma3</title></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* "ALIVE"
* "DEAD"
* "DEAD-RESPAWN"
* "DEAD-SWITCHING"
* "ASLEEP"
* "UNCONSCIOUS"
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* "HEALTHY"
* "DEAD"
* "DEAD-RESPAWN"
* "DEAD-SWITCHING"
* "INCAPACITATED"
* "INJURED"
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> In <template><title>arma3</title></template>, [[lifeState]] seems to change to "INJURED" when <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value> [[damage]] aliveUnit ><template><title>=</title></template> 0.1</value></part></template> (0.1 seeming to be the value defined in config under <template><title>sic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"InjuredTreshold"</value></part></template>). When the state is "INCAPACITATED", a sub-state is available via [[incapacitatedState]] command.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lifeState]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _lifeState = [[lifeState]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setUnconscious]], [[incapacitatedState]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
